title: Vintage Rolex Submariner
description: Rare 1960s Rolex Submariner watch in excellent condition with original box and papers.

title: Signed Picasso Lithograph
description: Authentic signed lithograph by Pablo Picasso from his 1950s series, certificate of authenticity included.

title: Antique Persian Rug
description: Hand-woven 19th century Persian rug, 8x10 feet, excellent condition with vibrant colors.

title: First Edition Harry Potter
description: Rare first edition of Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone, excellent condition with original dust jacket.

title: 1957 Gibson Les Paul
description: Vintage 1957 Gibson Les Paul electric guitar in sunburst finish, all original parts.

title: Rare Blue Mauritius Stamp
description: Extremely rare 1847 Post Office Mauritius one penny stamp in good condition for its age.
